constituent: mannerism, sickness, hospital, ketchup, flag, mouth, spicy, stand up, vase, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: Caveman has a bad mannerism of putting ketchup on everything he eats. I guess that´s ok since raw mammoth can´t be too good...
koohiiStory2: This mannerism is a sickness of the modern generation. It was only recently that we started putting ketchup on everything.
words: a habit (often a bad habit, i.e. vice), peculiarity
